item.title: As battery startups fail, Sila snaps up $375M in new funding
item.description:
Amid a fraught environment for battery startups, Sila has raised $375 million to finish construction of a U.S. factory that will scale its next-generation battery technology for customers like Mercedes-Benz and Panasonic by the end of 2025. Sila, formerly known as Sila Nanotechnologies, is slated to finish construction of its Moses Lake, Washington plant in […]

item.title: Chinese automakers expected to achieve 33% global market share by 2030
item.description: Chinese automakers are expected to continue to rapidly expand outside of China to achieve 33% of global automotive market share by 2030.

item.title: Car Hacking: State Police say trend is making its way to WNY
